title: Request a Copy of W-2 Form
description: A former employee needs a copy of their W-2 from the previous year for tax purposes.

tasks.description: Identify the former employee in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Payroll specialist locates the terminated employee's record.

tasks.description: Guide the former employee to the payroll vendor's alumni portal where they can access their tax documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist provides the portal URL and instructions for the former employee to self-serve.
